title: Split.Second.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:

Genre : Arcade / Racing (Cars) / 3D
Developer : Black Rock Studio
Publisher : Disney Interactive Studios
Published in Russia : New Disk
Publication Type : RePack
Language : ENG|RUS
Sound language : ENG|RUS

System requirements:
Operating system : Windows 7 / Vista SP2 / XP SP3
Processor : Intel Pentium D processor with a clock frequency of 3.0 GHz (Windows 7 / Vista) / Intel Pentium D processor with a clock frequency of 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 64 with a clock frequency of 2.0 GHz
RAM : 2 GB
Video card : NVIDIA 7600 or ATI Radeon X1600 with 256 MB VRAM
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 7 GB

Description :
To Bring swift race, and most people crave bread and circuses. New TV show is ready to satisfy all desires. Cameras are installed on city streets, and after each race ratings soaring. And if it needs to crush all the houses, parking lots, and the participants themselves - so be it! Everything is destroyed, threatening to forever bury the pilots under the rubble of bricks and cement blocks. Aggressive driving habits - the only chance to survive and become a true champion.
